mapper.select: SELECT h.DANJ_NO, h.RIQI_DATE, h.YANGH_STAFF, h.FUJ_STAFF, h.zhij_staff, h.CAOZ_STAFF, h.HOUSE_ID FROM GSP_YPFJCLTZD_HZ h WHERE h.danj_no IN (SELECT danj_no FROM GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX m WHERE h.DANJ_NO = m.danj_no AND m.SHENH_FLG = '1' AND m.chul_opin='3') AND H.RIQI_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{BEG_DATE}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND H.RIQI_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{END_DATE}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND H.HOUSE_ID = #{HOUSE_ID}

SELECT GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.DANJ_NO, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.DANJ_SORT, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.SHANGP_ID, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.LOT, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.XIANS_LOC, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.NUM, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.NUM BUHGP_NUM, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.NUM RUK_NUM, fnc_utl_getzdwh('ZHIL_QUESTION',GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.ZHIL_QUESTION) ZHIL_QUESTION, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.FUJ_RESULT, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.CHUL_OPIN, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.YIZ_ADDRESS, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.DANW_ID, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.CAIGOU_STAFF, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.SHENH_FLG, bi.item_code SHANGP_NO, bi.item_name CHINESE_NAME, bpi.package_meas YAOP_GUIG, bpi.package_unit BAOZ_DANW, bla.lot_id LOT, bla.lot02 SHENGCHAN_DATE, bla.lot03 YOUX_DATE, bi.remark MAKER, -- JC_SPZL.CAIGOU_STAFF, bc.customer_name DANW_NAME, bc.customer_code DANW_NO, bo.owner_name YEZ_NAME, bo.owner_id YEZ_ID, GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.HUOW_ID FROM GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX LEFT JOIN bas_item bi/*JC_SPZL*/ ON GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.SHANGP_ID = bi.item_id LEFT JOIN bas_customer bc/*JC_DWZL*/ ON GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.DANW_ID = bc.customer_id LEFT JOIN bas_owner bo/*JC_HZZL*/ ON GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.YEZ_ID = bo.woner_id LEFT JOIN bas_package_items bpi ON GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.SHANGP_ID = bpi.item_id and bpi.PACKAGE_LEVEL = '3' LEFT JOIN bas_lot_att bla /*JC_PHWHB*/ ON GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.SHANGP_ID = bla.item_id AND GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.LOT = bla.lot_id WHERE (GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.DANJ_NO = #{DANJ_NO} OR #{DANJ_NO}='%') AND GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.SHENH_FLG = '0' AND CHUL_OPIN='3' AND GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX.YEZ_ID =bi.owner_id
